name: adventofcode2023
description: My solutions to the Advent of Code 2023 (https://adventofcode.com/2023)

scripts.day1: npx run-func days/day1.js puzzle1 && npx run-func days/day1.js puzzle2
scripts.day2: npx run-func days/day2.js puzzle1 && npx run-func days/day2.js puzzle2
scripts.day3: npx run-func days/day3.js puzzle1 && npx run-func days/day3.js puzzle2
scripts.day4: npx run-func days/day4.js puzzle1 && npx run-func days/day4.js puzzle2
scripts.day5: npx run-func days/day5.js puzzle1 && npx run-func days/day5.js puzzle2

author: xHeitkamp(Robin Behlke)
